includedAssets.title: The Future In The Past
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep1 - The Future In The Past
includedAssets.synopsis: The forensic crime drama returns. With Brennan on the run, the Jeffersonian team work to prove she's been framed for murder by the evil Pelant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The forensic crime drama returns. With Brennan on the run, the Jeffersonian team work to prove she's been framed for murder by the evil Pelant.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The forensic crime drama returns. With Brennan on the run, the Jeffersonian team work to prove she's been framed for murder by the evil Pelant.

includedAssets.title: The Partners In The Divorce
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep2 - The Partners In The Divorce
includedAssets.synopsis: Normal life after being on the run is hard for Brennan and Booth, but could joining forces to solve the murder of a lawyer reignite the romance?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Normal life after being on the run is hard for Brennan and Booth, but could joining forces to solve the murder of a lawyer reignite the romance?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Normal life after being on the run is hard for Brennan and Booth, but could joining forces to solve the murder of a lawyer reignite the romance?

includedAssets.title: The Gunk In The Garage
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep3 - The Gunk In The Garage
includedAssets.synopsis: An explosion in a hotel garage results in a messy case of misidentification for Brennan while Booth takes on an assignment to bag a promotion.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An explosion in a hotel garage results in a messy case of misidentification for Brennan while Booth takes on an assignment to bag a promotion.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An explosion in a hotel garage results in a messy case of misidentification for Brennan while Booth takes on an assignment to bag a promotion.

includedAssets.title: The Tiger in the Tale
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep4 - The Tiger in the Tale
includedAssets.synopsis: Booth braves the wild world of animal trafficking to investigate a murder case while Brennan contemplates swapping the lab for the White House.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Booth braves the wild world of animal trafficking to investigate a murder case while Brennan contemplates swapping the lab for the White House.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Booth braves the wild world of animal trafficking to investigate a murder case while Brennan contemplates swapping the lab for the White House.

includedAssets.title: The Method in the Madness
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep5 - The Method in the Madness
includedAssets.synopsis: Booth invites Sweets to stay at the family home, but soon regrets it. The team investigate what they suspect to be a modern-day Jack the Ripper.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Booth invites Sweets to stay at the family home, but soon regrets it. The team investigate what they suspect to be a modern-day Jack the Ripper.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Booth invites Sweets to stay at the family home, but soon regrets it. The team investigate what they suspect to be a modern-day Jack the Ripper.

includedAssets.title: The Patriot In Purgatory
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep6 - The Patriot In Purgatory
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan experiments with basketball to help turn the squinterns into a team, while Booth investigates remains linked to the 9/11 terrorist attacks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan experiments with basketball to help turn the squinterns into a team, while Booth investigates remains linked to the 9/11 terrorist attacks.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan experiments with basketball to help turn the squinterns into a team, while Booth investigates remains linked to the 9/11 terrorist attacks.

includedAssets.title: The Bod in the Pod
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep7 - The Bod in the Pod
includedAssets.synopsis: The team hit the beach to examine a strange pod containing gelatinised remains. Hodgins is convinced it's of alien origin, but Brennan detects foul play.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team hit the beach to examine a pod containing gelatinised remains. Hodgins is convinced it's of alien origin, but Brennan detects foul play.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team hit the beach to examine a strange pod containing gelatinised remains. Hodgins is convinced it's of alien origin, but Brennan detects foul play.

includedAssets.title: The But In The Joke
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep8 - The But In The Joke
includedAssets.synopsis: The murder of a stand-up comedian results in Booth taking to the stage to find the killer. Also, Angela uncovers the identity of a Banksy-style artist.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The murder of a stand-up comedian results in Booth taking to the stage to find the killer. Also, Angela uncovers the identity of a Banksy-style artist
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The murder of a stand-up comedian results in Booth taking to the stage to find the killer. Also, Angela uncovers the identity of a Banksy-style artist.

includedAssets.title: The Ghost In The Machine
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep9 - The Ghost In The Machine
includedAssets.synopsis: Fan favourite Avalon Harmonia, played by Cyndi Lauper, is called in to contact the spirit of a deceased teenager with unfinished business.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fan favourite Avalon Harmonia, played by Cyndi Lauper, is called in to contact the spirit of a deceased teenager with unfinished business.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Fan favourite Avalon Harmonia, played by Cyndi Lauper, is called in to contact the spirit of a deceased teenager with unfinished business.

includedAssets.title: The Diamond In The Rough
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep10 - The Diamond In The Rough
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan and Booth go undercover to solve the murder of a ballroom dancer. Can the pair bunny-hop and blag their way into the showbiz world?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan and Booth go undercover to solve the murder of a ballroom dancer. Can the pair bunny-hop and blag their way into the showbiz world?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan and Booth go undercover to solve the murder of a ballroom dancer. Can the pair bunny-hop and blag their way into the showbiz world?

includedAssets.title: The Archaeologist In The Cocoon
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep11 - The Archaeologist In The Cocoon
includedAssets.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team tackle two cases: one from this century and another dating back 25,000 years. Could there be a link between them?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Jeffersonian team tackle two cases: one from this century and another dating back 25,000 years. Could there be a link between them?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Jeffersonian team tackle two cases: one from this century and another dating back 25,000 years. Could there be a link between them?

includedAssets.title: The Corpse on the Canopy
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep12 - The Corpse on the Canopy
includedAssets.synopsis: When Hodgins and Angela find the corpse of a Special Forces agent hanging over their bed, they instantly know who is responsible: Pelant is back.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Hodgins and Angela find the corpse of a Special Forces agent hanging over their bed, they instantly know who is responsible: Pelant is back.

includedAssets.title: The Twist In The Plot
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep13 - The Twist In The Plot
includedAssets.synopsis: When Booth and Brennan inspect the murder of a cancer patient, the pair find they have drastically different views on how they want to be remembered.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Booth and Brennan inspect the murder of a cancer patient, the pair find they have drastically different views on how they want to be remembered.

includedAssets.title: The Doll in the Derby
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep14 - The Doll in the Derby
includedAssets.synopsis: Angela goes undercover in the cut-throat world of roller derby skating and the team try to find the truth about Booth's curious medical appointment.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Angela goes undercover in the cut-throat world of roller derby skating and the team try to find the truth about Booth's curious medical appointment.

includedAssets.title: The Shot in the Dark
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep15 - The Shot in the Dark
includedAssets.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team are thrown into hysteria when Brennan is shot while working on a case in which a murder was made to look like suicide.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Jeffersonian team are thrown into hysteria when Brennan is shot while working on a case in which a murder was made to look like suicide.

includedAssets.title: The Friend in Need
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep16 - The Friend in Need
includedAssets.synopsis: The remains of a teenage boy are uncovered in a suitcase and, although he was a straight-A student, Booth discovers he was hiding a darker side.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The remains of a teenage boy are uncovered in a suitcase and, although he was a straight-A student, Booth discovers he was hiding a darker side.

includedAssets.title: The Fact in the Fiction
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep17 - The Fact in the Fiction
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan welcomes a new squintern into the Jeffersonian lab with (prised) open arms and their first case involves an aspiring time traveller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan welcomes a new squintern into the Jeffersonian lab with (prised) open arms and their first case involves an aspiring time traveller.

includedAssets.title: The Survivor in the Soap
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep18 - The Survivor in the Soap
includedAssets.synopsis: An emotionally-charged episode deals with the murder of a former child soldier from Sierra Leone and a crisis in Cam's secret relationship.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An emotionally-charged episode deals with the murder of a former child soldier from Sierra Leone and a crisis in Cam's secret relationship.

includedAssets.title: The Doom in the Gloom
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep19 - The Doom in the Gloom
includedAssets.synopsis: The death of an ex-marine leads the team to a group of doomsday preppers, while Brennan dreads the impending flight of Sweets from the family nest.

includedAssets.title: The Blood from the Stones
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep20 - The Blood from the Stones
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan fights for the limelight when a film-maker enters the lab to capture a unique case about a corpse decomposing in an extraordinary way.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan fights for the limelight when a film-maker enters the lab to capture a unique case about a corpse decomposing in an extraordinary way.

includedAssets.title: The Maiden in the Mushrooms
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep21 - The Maiden in the Mushrooms
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan is determined to prove Christine is no 'average' child while Booth investigates a TV producer who ended up dead in an obscure location.

includedAssets.title: The Party in the Pants
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep22 - The Party in the Pants
includedAssets.synopsis: Tears abound as Booth reunites with his mother after 24 years apart amid an investigation into the death of a banker who doubled as a male stripper.

includedAssets.title: The Pathos in the Pathogens
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep23 - The Pathos in the Pathogens
includedAssets.synopsis: Crisis strikes when the Jeffersonian team detect a potential bio-terrorist threat and intern Arastoo contracts the obscure virus.

includedAssets.title: The Secret in the Siege
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep24 - The Secret in the Siege
includedAssets.synopsis: Tech genius Christopher Pelant returns to seek revenge on Booth and the FBI agents closest to him in an emotional season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Brennan is in hiding and Booth has been demoted, but with a killer to catch, the pair won't be able to stay out of the action for long. Dramatic eighth season. Emily Deschanel and David Boreanaz star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brennan is in hiding and Booth has been demoted, but with a killer to catch, the pair won't be able to stay out of the action for long.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brennan is in hiding and Booth has been demoted, but with a killer to catch, the pair won't be able to stay out of the action for long. Dramatic eighth season. Emily Deschanel and David Boreanaz star.

includedIn.title: Bones
includedIn.synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to investigate murders where the only remnants of the victims are bones.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to solve murders using the victim’s bones.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to investigate murders where the only remnants of the victims are bones.
